summary.span: 定義用來建立對等訊息傳輸通道的繫結項目。

span.span: Defines the binding element used to create a peer message transport channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個傳輸不可與具有要求/回覆作業的合約一起使用。This transport cannot be used with contracts that have request/reply operations.

summary.span: 建立可用來建立傳送訊息之通道的通道處理站。

span.span: Creates a channel factory that can be used to create a channel for sending messages.

returns.span: ，其中包含指定之型別的新通道處理站。

span.span: that contains the new channel factory of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來取得依據傳輸繫結項目組態的通道處理站。This method can be used to get a channel factory based on the configuration of the transport binding element. ## Examples 這個方法可用來取得通道處理站，以便依據傳輸繫結項目的組態傳送訊息。This method can be used to get a channel factory for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.

span.span: The parameter is set to .

exception.span: 這個通道處理站的繫結內容中會指定手動定址。

span.span: Manual addressing was specified in the binding context for this channel factory.

exception.span: 不支援這個繫結內容所指定的通道類型。

span.span: The channel type indicated by this binding context is not supported.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定可透過這個繫結項目所建立傳輸通道傳送的訊息大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that specifies the maximum size, in bytes, of messages sent over transport channels created by this binding element.

value.span: 透過這個繫結項目所建立之傳輸通道傳送的訊息大小上限。

span.span: The maximum size of messages sent over transport channels created by this binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的訊息大小為 65,536 個位元組。The default message size is 65,536 bytes.
